statements: DELETE FROM EducationalInterventionsData WHERE student_id = 100 AND intervention_type = 'Reading';
DELETE FROM EducationalInterventionsData WHERE intervention_id = 100 AND student_id = 200
DELETE FROM InterventionResults WHERE student_id = 101 AND intervention_type = 'Math Tutoring';
DELETE FROM StudentInfo WHERE grade_level = '10th Grade' AND teacher_name = 'Mr. Smith' AND parent_email = 'parent@example.com';
DELETE FROM StudentRecords WHERE course_id = 2 AND score < 60;
DELETE FROM StudentRecords WHERE student_id = 123 AND course_id = 456;
DELETE FROM Enrollments WHERE student_id = 5 AND course_id = 3;
DELETE FROM Intervention_Ratings WHERE student_id = 101 AND intervention_type = 'Behavior'
DELETE FROM Student_Profiles WHERE grade_level = 'High School' AND age > 18;
